calendar.p: The Julian calendar, as used in England before 1752. The year starts on March 25.

A Hebrew calendar dating from the creation of the world, based on biblical genealogy. The start date varies according to the biblical texts used. Here, based on the dates given for the same events in other formats, this calendar starts in 3962 BC.
A calendar dating from the Roman discovery of Britain. Based on the dates given for the same events in other formats, this calendar starts in 50 BC.

body.ab:
Anno: domini: 1559
Restitution of the Title of Supreme heade In this parliament the ffirst fruites & Tenthes were restored
to the Crowne. And also the supereame gouernement over
the estate ecclesiasticall. which Quene Mary had geven
to the Pope. Anno: RegniReginae: Elizabethae: 1mo ./ pHollingshed: pag:
1180.
Cardinal wolsei his Heraulde
Cardynall Wolsey (beside many other his servantes & officers
had .4. ffootmen which were garnished in riche Rvnninge
Coates whensoeuer he rode in any iourney. Then had he
also an Heraulde of Armes. &c Ibidem: pag: 920. Anno
RegniRegis: Henrici: 8: 23.
Anno: Mundi .3586.Anno: ante Christum: 377.Anno ant Britannia cognitam. - 327
Mausolus kinge of Carda raigned, whose wife Artemesia builded
for hym a wonderfull sepulchre, which was taken for one of the
goodly workes of the worlde. Of which all goodly monuments of
Deade men are called Mawseola. Chro: Cowperi: fol: 58./
Drawing of the columns of Hercules Hercules the Sonne of Amphitrio & Alcmena was a defender
of Justice a chastiser of iniustyce & a relyver of the oppressed
& of greate leuity towards them that he had succoured. ffor
which vertues he obtayned as greate renowne as euer Prynce had
done before his time Ibidem fol:24.
Anno. Mundi. 8712.Anno ante Christ .1251.
ffurthermore he delyuered the Sea aboutes Italye & Spayne from
Pyrates & Robbers: & for a perpetuall memory therof he commanded
two greate Rocks to be set vp in the vttermost Corners of
Spayne & Affricke which at this daye are called the Colvmns
of Hercules. Ibidem ./
